item.description:
HO! Ho! HO! Its a Come & Go!!  Get some holiday shopping done!  And...bring your unwanted gold to get cash to spend!  :)

Its here! Back by popular demand...5th annual Holiday Open House!

Lets kick off the holiday season in style!!
From 1-5 pm on Sat. November 26th!

This year we are featuring Handbags, Lia Sophia Jewelry, Winter Scarves, UGG boots & gloves,  Lindt chocolate gift items, Skin care, $$$$ for your old gold on the spot, broken or not!!  Plus...more "secret" suprises!

There will be raffles & giveaways & One lucky lady will win *$100* in free jewelry!!!

All shopaholics welcome...  A donation will be made to the Make A Wish Foundation as well!

Bring a friend if you wish! The more the MERRIER!

Happy Holidays!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a table with Lindt Chocolate items!
item.name: Wakefield Holiday Gift Open House 1-5 pm with multiple vendors! Stop by any time
